Mayor and City Council
======================

![Philip Ray](https://www.cityofbrazoria.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=803)

On behalf of City Council, I would like to take a moment to welcome you to Brazoria. We love our community and hope you will enjoy Brazoria as a virtual visitor, tourist, resident, or business person. I appreciate this opportunity to extend to you a warm and hearty welcome.

As your Mayor, I want to convey how excited I am about serving you in a manner that will be productive, prosperous, and unifying. Brazoria and its residents are worthy of the best, and it is my mission to achieve great things for our community. That is my commitment to you. Together, we can move our community forward in an unprecedented manner.

My challenge to our residents is to look for ways to get involved, solve issues and to make others around us better! As a new resident, I encourage you to get involved in your community by attending a City Council meeting.

Thank you for making this such a special place to live and raise a family. If I can ever be of assistance to you, please do not hesitate to contact me. Again, on behalf of the City Council members, welcome to Brazoria, Texas! I look forward to working with and for all of you!

Philip Ray

Mayor
